original_text: Instead, Johanan and all the officers led the people away. Those were the people who had returned from all the nations where their enemies had taken them as prisoners. They had returned to their homes in Judah.
korean_text: 가레아의 아들 요하난과 모든 군 지휘관이 유다의 남은 자 곧 쫓겨났던 여러 나라 가운데에서 유다 땅에 살려 하여 돌아온 자

sentences.original_text: Instead, Johanan and all the officers led the people away.
sentences.korean_translation: 대신, 요하난과 모든 관원들이 백성을 이끌고 떠났습니다.

sentences.original_text: who had returned from all the nations
where their enemies had taken them as prisoners.
They had returned to their homes in Judah.
